About

Princeton Tonight is Princeton University's broadcast television show! Featuring celebrity guest interviews plus the best that Princeton television and film has to offer from sketch comedy to short films, there's something for everyone. Like us on Facebook for updates on content releases and live events near you - they're always free and open to the public.

Join our mailing list to learn about upcoming events and video updates.
